name: Korean BBQ: Easy Beef and Pork Belly Bulgogi
description: Perfect for a quick and flavorful Korean BBQ, this pork and beef bulgogi marinade uses a delicious store-bought Korean BBQ sauce as the base, with a few extra ingredients to liven it up. Use either galbi/kalbi or bulgogi sauces.
keywords: Korean bbq galbi marinade, Korean bbq kalbi marinade, korean bbq bulgogi marinade, easy beef bulgogi recipe, easy pork bulgogi recipe, pork belly bulgogi marinade, quick korean bbq marinade, homemade bulgogi sauce, authentic korean bbq recipe, best bulgogi marinade, easy bulgogi marinade recipe, korean grilled meat recipe, simple bulgogi marinade, simple korean bbq marinade recipe, simple Korean bbq meat marinade, Korean bbq short rib marinade, Korean bbq beef marinade, Korean bbq pork marinade, best store-bought Korean bbq marinade

video.name: Korean BBQ Simple Marinade for Pork and Beef Bulgogi
video.description: Korean BBQ Simple Marinade for Pork and Beef Bulgogi

recipeIngredient: 1 lb meat (thinly sliced beef or pork belly/pork shoulder)
1 cup store-bought Korean BBQ sauce (CJ or Wang brands)
recipeInstructions: In a medium bowl, mix together Korean BBQ sauce, sesame oil, and chopped green onions. Mix well and adjust to taste if needed. If it's too sweet, add a little light soy sauce.
Once it's to your liking, add the meat and marinate for at least 30 minutes, or overnight in the fridge for better results.
Thinly sliced meat requires only 3 to 4 minutes of grilling. For bone-in meat, add an additional 2 minutes per side.
